entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

tweets.text:
@a_merrydew @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe And finally! This is the one they’ve been donating. A few different options for you x 

https://t.co/wbVC9zhgpQ

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 😔 that's what breaks my heart even more. I feel hopeless and then I think about all the children that are suffering in these deplorable conditions. I am scared to think of the long-term impacts on their health, education, and more. I send my love to you and your family.
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @Kimble8313 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off We didn't get one, thought we wouldn't need it, do they work, tonight is horrendous.

@a_merrydew @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off ..2/2 anxiety is still bad wondering how bad it’s getting in my little boys room. Sleep torture is right, a bad stretch starts making me crazy, have sent some really unbalanced emails in the middle of the night before! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@a_merrydew @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off Really sorry about that, it’s a no win situation. We have to keep fighting - we have nothing to lose- they’re already taking our health, our children’s health, our sleep, our sanity & the equity in our properties. We will stick together & we will keep fighting ❤️

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off My family live 3 hours away so I can't go stay with them 😔 I hope you're OK, though sadly I suspect you're not given how strong the hydrogen sulfide odour is again tonight xx

tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

@Kimble8313 @EnvAgencyMids And can't hear the TV over my air purifier as it is going ballistic - happy May bank holiday @ClareDinnisEA bet you didn't stick around very long if you were even here at all that is 😡 @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

Judging by social media it’s another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. 😢🤢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

Are you asleep @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA cos I’m awake with toxic fumes engulfing the house. We can’t breathe! Lovely understanding lady when I just reported it to @EnvAgency. She should have your job.@ClareDinnisEA Newcastle-Under-Lyme needs evacuating

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off I can't believe it's been allowed to go on for so many years and the community has been ignored time & time again. They are "acutely aware" of our concerns and yet continue to accept more waste, causing further odour and sleep deprivation. Sleep deprivation is a form of torture.
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency They're also allowing kids to be poisoned in Newcastle under Lyme mate.

Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Starting in the Thistleberry now😩🤮😷 @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink

The air so polluted that little children are vomiting! Shame on you @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC SHAME ON YOU! @NSPCC #stopthestink https://t.co/ENQE4OzSAy

@EnvAgencyMids I am trying to email a complaint about the smell from Walleys landfill and your email is blocked. It worked yesterday. This seems rather odd. The smell is inside my house and my eyes are really sore. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@AaronBell4NUL What a time to be alive & struggling to breath  @ClareDinnisEA are you willing to let the bodies pile high in Newcastle under Lyme @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk when will you see the growing environment & health issues? You know this is wrong @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

The whole town seems to be engulfed by it, what on earth is happening? Do the @EnvAgency need to be called out as an emergency @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC ? Total loss of control @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/0nmjXA9mHi

V polite saying a bit https://t.co/WZcIHq4oKp’s another tick on the negligence list for https://t.co/jgo2Bmsx90 organisation that does not step up to take responsibility for their own failings& demonstrates embarrassing levels of cowardice @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off https://t.co/ydjwrvJ5gz
@Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink https://t.co/WpIniyVPgH
